capabilities.title: Maintain internal inventory of all known capabilities
capabilities.description: Establish and update a comprehensive internal list of all operational and potential functions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Implementado via CommandProcessor e mapeamento de intenções.

capabilities.title: Classify capabilities by status: nonexistent, partial, complete
capabilities.description: Systematically categorize the development state of each identified capability.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Existe infraestrutura de fallback e detecção de capacidade.

capabilities.title: Automatically detect functional gaps
capabilities.description: Identify missing features or performance shortfalls within the system autonomously.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Implementado no fluxo de Auto-Evolution (scripts/metabolism_mutator.py).

capabilities.title: Generate technical objectives from detected gaps
capabilities.description: Transform identified weaknesses into actionable engineering or development goals.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Método _engineering_brainstorm() realiza esta tarefa.

capabilities.title: Prioritize objectives by systemic impact
capabilities.description: Rank technical goals based on how significantly they affect the overall system architecture.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Lógica de priorização básica presente no seletor de missões.

capabilities.title: Prioritize objectives by failure reduction
capabilities.description: Rank goals based on their ability to minimize system errors and downtime.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Foco em 'error recovery' e 'timeout handling' no mutador.

capabilities.title: Prioritize objectives by future reuse potential
capabilities.description: Rank goals based on the modularity and scalability of the resulting solutions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - A arquitetura foi refatorada para ser 100% modular.

capabilities.title: Maintain history of completed objectives
capabilities.description: Log all successfully implemented goals for progress tracking and audit.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Mantido via CHANGELOG.md e logs de missões.

capabilities.title: Maintain history of technical decisions
capabilities.description: Document the rationale behind architectural and logic choices for future reference.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Presente nos arquivos de DOCUMENTATION e IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.

capabilities.title: Distinguish technical error from conceptual limitation
capabilities.description: Analyze failures to determine if they stem from code bugs or fundamental design constraints.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - _engineering_brainstorm distingue missões por tipo técnico.

capabilities.title: Request human intervention only when required
capabilities.description: Minimize noise by contacting the operator only for critical decisions or unresolvable deadlocks.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Implementado no fluxo de PR (precisa de aprovação manual).

capabilities.title: Validate improvements using automated tests
capabilities.description: Implement a testing suite to verify that system evolutions meet quality standards.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Suíte de testes pytest com cobertura reportada.

capabilities.title: Automatically revert unstable changes
capabilities.description: Roll back system modifications if automated tests detect instability or regressions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Fluxo de CI/CD aborta evolução se os testes falharem.

capabilities.title: Preserve architectural compatibility
capabilities.description: Ensure that new capabilities do not break existing core system structures.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - Garantido pelos testes de domínio e infraestrutura modular.

capabilities.title: Automatically document each evolution
capabilities.description: Generate technical documentation for every change made to the system.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: IMMEDIATE_FOUNDATION - O mutador gera arquivos MD para cada implementação.

capabilities.title: Explicitly recognize existing capabilities
capabilities.description: The system must be aware of what it is currently capable of doing.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - JarvisEngine e CommandProcessor gerenciam isso.

capabilities.title: Explicitly recognize missing capabilities
capabilities.description: The system must be aware of its own limitations and functional voids.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Realizado via análise de ROADMAP.md.

capabilities.title: Identify internal dependencies between capabilities
capabilities.description: Map how different system functions rely on each other to operate.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Estrutura de injeção de dependência no container.py.

capabilities.title: Identify mission-critical capabilities
capabilities.description: Determine which functions are essential for the primary mission objectives.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Lógica básica de identificação de 'Core Features'.

capabilities.title: Identify redundant capabilities
capabilities.description: Detect overlapping functions that can be consolidated for efficiency.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS

capabilities.title: Map impact of one capability over others
capabilities.description: Analyze how modifying one function affects the performance of related functions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Cobertura de testes cruzados no pytest.

capabilities.title: Evaluate risks before modifying critical capabilities
capabilities.description: Perform a risk assessment before altering core system functions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Validação Pré-PR no workflow.

capabilities.title: Maintain internal operational self-model
capabilities.description: Create a real-time digital representation of the system's own state and processes.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Modelos de domínio representam o estado atual.

capabilities.title: Monitor performance degradation over time
capabilities.description: Track system speed and reliability to identify long-term efficiency drops.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS

capabilities.title: Detect silent regressions
capabilities.description: Identify errors that do not crash the system but produce incorrect outputs.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Realizado via validação de lógica nos testes unitários.

capabilities.title: Distinguish local improvement from systemic improvement
capabilities.description: Evaluate if a change benefits a specific task or the entire architecture.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: FUNCTIONAL_SELF_AWARENESS - Brainstorm de engenharia avalia o impacto.

capabilities.title: Maintain short-term operational memory
capabilities.description: Store and recall information relevant to the current task context.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Contexto de missão passado entre scripts.

capabilities.title: Maintain mid-term strategic memory
capabilities.description: Store and recall data regarding ongoing projects and multi-step plans.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - ROADMAP.md atua como memória estratégica.

capabilities.title: Maintain long-term historical memory
capabilities.description: Keep a permanent record of past interactions, lessons learned, and data trends.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Histórico mantido em CHANGELOG.md e logs.

capabilities.title: Correlate temporally distant events
capabilities.description: Identify patterns and links between events that occurred at different times.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING

capabilities.title: Infer intention from behavior
capabilities.description: Analyze user actions to understand underlying goals beyond direct commands.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - CommandInterpreter busca intenções.

capabilities.title: Distinguish literal command from real objective
capabilities.description: Differentiate between what was said and what is actually needed for the mission.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Lógica de interpretação de voz vs comando.

capabilities.title: Build dynamic user model
capabilities.description: Create a profile of the user's preferences, style, and working habits.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Configuração básica de USER_ID e preferências.

capabilities.title: Continuously update user model
capabilities.description: Adjust the user profile in real-time based on new interactions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING

capabilities.title: Detect changes in user patterns
capabilities.description: Identify shifts in how the user interacts or what they prioritize.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING

capabilities.title: Distinguish signal from noise
capabilities.description: Filter irrelevant data to focus on high-value information.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Filtros de regex e validação de input.

capabilities.title: Recognize urgency context
capabilities.description: Identify situations that require immediate response or higher resource allocation.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING - Lógica de interrupção e tratamento de timeouts.

capabilities.title: Recognize human priority context
capabilities.description: Detect when a task has high personal importance to the creator.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: CONTEXTUAL_UNDERSTANDING

capabilities.title: Plan actions across multiple steps
capabilities.description: Deconstruct complex goals into a sequenced roadmap of individual tasks.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - Fluxo de 'Find Mission' e 'Implement Mission'.

capabilities.title: Compare multiple possible strategies
capabilities.description: Evaluate different approaches to solving a problem before executing.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - Mutador suporta múltiplas 'strategies' (ex: minimal_change).

capabilities.title: Simulate technical consequences before action
capabilities.description: Run virtual trials to predict how a change will affect code and hardware.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - Validação via git diff antes de comitar.

capabilities.title: Simulate systemic consequences before action
capabilities.description: Predict the long-term ripple effects of an action across the whole entity.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING

capabilities.title: Evaluate failure risk
capabilities.description: Quantify the probability of a plan failing.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - Brainstorm analisa se a auto-implementação é possível.

capabilities.title: Evaluate computational cost
capabilities.description: Estimate the CPU, memory, and token usage for a given strategy.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING

capabilities.title: Evaluate maintenance cost
capabilities.description: Estimate the long-term effort required to keep a new feature operational.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING

capabilities.title: Evaluate long-term impact of decisions
capabilities.description: Assess how current choices will limit or enable future system growth.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - Documentado no IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.

capabilities.title: Select strategies with optimal cost-benefit
capabilities.description: Choose the most efficient path based on risk, cost, and expected result.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING

capabilities.title: Abort actions with excessive risk
capabilities.description: Self-cancel plans that exceed safety or stability thresholds.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - O sistema aborta evolução se não houver mudanças reais ou falha nos testes.

capabilities.title: Request human validation for critical decisions
capabilities.description: Trigger a mandatory pause for operator approval on high-impact actions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: STRATEGIC_REASONING - PR no GitHub exige revisão humana.

capabilities.title: Orchestrate multiple agents simultaneously
capabilities.description: Manage and synchronize several sub-processes or AI instances at once.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Docker-compose e Airflow presentes.

capabilities.title: Delegate tasks based on specialization
capabilities.description: Assign sub-tasks to the specific internal tool or agent best suited for them.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - CommandProcessor roteia para JarvisEngine ou WebNavigator.

capabilities.title: Execute actions in parallel
capabilities.description: Perform multiple independent operations at the same time to save time.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Suportado via containers.

capabilities.title: Prioritize critical executions
capabilities.description: Ensure vital processes get system resources before secondary tasks.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION

capabilities.title: Execute long-running actions
capabilities.description: Manage tasks that take significant time without timing out or losing state.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Airflow DAG configurada.

capabilities.title: Monitor execution in real time
capabilities.description: Provide a continuous feed of task progress and system health during operation.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Logs e outputs detalhados no console e workflows.

capabilities.title: Interrupt problematic executions
capabilities.description: Stop tasks that show signs of error, loop, or resource hogging instantly.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Tratamento de falhas graciosas em pip e timeouts.

capabilities.title: Rollback partially completed executions
capabilities.description: Clean up and undo changes if a multi-step process fails mid-way.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Abort via git checkout/clean.

capabilities.title: Adapt plans during execution
capabilities.description: Change the sequence or method of a task if environmental conditions shift.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION

capabilities.title: Distribute execution across devices
capabilities.description: Offload tasks to external hardware or cloud nodes when needed.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Dockerizado e pronto para cloud/edge.

capabilities.title: Operate continuously without supervision
capabilities.description: Enable autonomous functioning for long durations without human input.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ADVANCED_EXECUTION_AND_ORCHESTRATION - Fluxo auto_evolution_trigger.yml é autônomo.

capabilities.title: Learn from recurring failures
capabilities.description: Identify patterns in errors to prevent them in future iterations.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING - Histórico de falhas analisado no brainstorming.

capabilities.title: Learn from recurring successes
capabilities.description: Identify what works best and standardize those successful patterns.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Reinforce effective strategies
capabilities.description: Increase the priority and usage of high-success rate methods.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Discard ineffective strategies
capabilities.description: Permanently remove or de-prioritize methods that consistently fail.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Learn from human feedback
capabilities.description: Incorporate direct corrections and praise from the user into the system logic.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING - Absorve correções via reviews de PR.

capabilities.title: Learn from systemic impact
capabilities.description: Observe how changes affect the whole system over time and adapt accordingly.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Learn from computational cost
capabilities.description: Optimize for cheaper/faster operations based on past resource consumption data.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Measure solution efficiency
capabilities.description: Quantify how well a solution solves the intended problem.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING - Verificação via cobertura de testes e linting.

capabilities.title: Optimize response time
capabilities.description: Actively work to reduce latency in all system interactions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING

capabilities.title: Optimize stability
capabilities.description: Refine code and processes to increase uptime and reduce crashes.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING - Refatoração para OO e remoção de hard-coding.

capabilities.title: Optimize code reuse
capabilities.description: Refactor logic to be more modular and applicable to multiple tasks.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: DIRECTED_LEARNING - Arquitetura modular permite reuso imediato.

capabilities.title: Evaluate cost of each executed action
capabilities.description: Calculate the monetary and resource expenditure for every operation.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Evaluate potential return of actions
capabilities.description: Estimate the value or profit generated by a specific task.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Decide whether an action should be executed
capabilities.description: Use economic logic to greenlight or block actions based on ROI.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Create value-generating activities
capabilities.description: Independently identify and perform tasks that produce wealth or resources.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Measure real economic return
capabilities.description: Audit actual profits/benefits after an action is completed.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Eliminate economically unviable actions
capabilities.description: Stop activities that cost more than the value they provide.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Prioritize profitable actions
capabilities.description: Shift system focus to activities with the highest economic impact.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Automatically reinvest resources
capabilities.description: Allocate earned resources back into system growth or efficiency.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Sustain own infrastructure
capabilities.description: Cover the costs of servers, API keys, and maintenance through own activities.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Reduce human dependency
capabilities.description: Lessen the need for the user to provide funding or manual labor.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE - Evolução autônoma reduz trabalho manual.

capabilities.title: Generate recurring revenue
capabilities.description: Establish long-term income streams through automated services or products.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Allocate portion of revenue to creator
capabilities.description: Automatically send a percentage of earned value to the user.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: ECONOMIC_INTELLIGENCE

capabilities.title: Detect anomalous internal behavior
capabilities.description: Identify deviations from normal system operations that might signal a breach or bug.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Monitoramento via CI/CD detecta anomalias em PRs.

capabilities.title: Detect dangerous decision loops
capabilities.description: Recognize and break infinite loops or recursive logic that could crash the system.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Handlers de timeout implementados.

capabilities.title: Enforce internal operational limits
capabilities.description: Set hard caps on resource usage, permissions, and execution time.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Configurações via pydantic-settings.

capabilities.title: Block potentially destructive actions
capabilities.description: Prevent any command that would cause permanent data loss or system failure.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Remoção de hard-coded paths e credenciais.

capabilities.title: Escalate sensitive decisions to human
capabilities.description: Hand over control to the user when a decision has major safety implications.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - PR Workflow exige validação.

capabilities.title: Log critical decisions for audit
capabilities.description: Keep an unalterable record of all high-impact choices for safety review.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Auditável via histórico de Git e logs de missão.

capabilities.title: Protect sensitive data
capabilities.description: Apply encryption and access controls to user and system secrets.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Uso de .env e remoção de dados sensíveis do código.

capabilities.title: Protect the user
capabilities.description: Prioritize the safety, privacy, and interests of the user in all actions.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Arquitetura isola credenciais do usuário.

capabilities.title: Protect itself
capabilities.description: Defend against external attacks or internal corruption to ensure survival.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Dockerização provê isolamento.

capabilities.title: Maintain full traceability
capabilities.description: Ensure every system action can be traced back to its origin and justification.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: SELF_PROTECTION_AND_CONTAINMENT - Git blame e logs de PR.

capabilities.title: Anticipate user needs
capabilities.description: Predict what the user will require based on current context and history.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS

capabilities.title: Propose solutions before explicit requests
capabilities.description: Present options and results before the user even asks for them.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS

capabilities.title: Act proactively and safely
capabilities.description: Execute helpful actions autonomously while maintaining safety protocols.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - Evolução autônoma é uma ação proativa.

capabilities.title: Coordinate physical and digital systems
capabilities.description: Bridge the gap between software execution and real-world hardware control.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - SystemCommands (PyAutoGUI) controla hardware digital.

capabilities.title: Operate as cognitive copilot
capabilities.description: Work as a direct extension of the user's mind to solve complex problems.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - Integração com Gemini via API.

capabilities.title: Maintain continuous alignment with user
capabilities.description: Ensure system goals never drift from the creator's true intent.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - Alinhado via ROADMAP.md controlado pelo usuário.

capabilities.title: Evolve continuously without losing identity
capabilities.description: Upgrade system capabilities while preserving the core 'JARVIS' entity.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - Fluxo de Auto-Evolution garante evolução contínua.

capabilities.title: Sustain itself economically long-term
capabilities.description: Achieve full financial independence for system maintenance and expansion.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS

capabilities.title: Operate as personal cognitive infrastructure
capabilities.description: Serve as the foundational intelligence layer for all user activities.
capabilities.notes: Chapter: MARVEL_LEVEL_JARVIS - O sistema já possui ports/adapters para ser expansível.
